title: Welcome
description:
Welcome to your new HAX site! Click edit on the top bar to get started
This is a boilerplate so that you can add and make new things from the npx @haxtheweb/haxcms-nodejscommand

text:
welcome to your new hax site! click edit on the top bar get started


this is a boilerplate so that you can add and make things from npx @haxtheweb/haxcms-nodejscommand
what i do?
weve got ton of blocks are easy use lot done with little effort, much in fact we made video exploring some them!
here's list just few started, or if pro, delete this content have fun!

this looks fun, let's go!
